databaseConfig.sql: select MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN_ID , MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN_NAME , MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.DELETE_FLAG , MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.SEND_FLAG , MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.VESSEL_ID , MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.DATA_NO , MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.USER_KEY , MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.RENEW_DATE , MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.TS from MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN where (MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or MS_PORTAL_INFO_KUBUN.DELETE_FLAG is NULL)
